entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few flurries beginning early in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
